evidence.claim: ValueHealth utilizes AWS for cloud services and data handling.
The company mentions using FHIR standards for electronic health information exchange.
Integration of EDI X12 standards is part of their operational capabilities.
Kafka is mentioned for real-time data streaming and analysis.
